Description: Lower body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; from top: band of tongues doubly outline in white, alternating red and black; two narrow white bands; band of alternating red and white tongues between white bands; another band of alternating red and white tongues; exterior: seven streaky brown bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1564) (phase 2)
